description.displayText: Margot has stayed with my kids while we have gone out of town for the weekend. I have two very active boys and they absolutely love her because she is a lot of fun and I love her because she runs a tight ship. I know their homework and chores will be done and they will get to bed on time. She also ran the barn where my boys go to camp and they loved going on trail rides with her. She is a very responsible and fun babysitter. I never met a kid that did not fall in love with her.
description.originalText: Margot has stayed with my kids while we have gone out of town for the weekend. I have two very active boys and they absolutely love her because she is a lot of fun and I love her because she runs a tight ship. I know their homework and chores will be done and they will get to bed on time. She also ran the barn where my boys go to camp and they loved going on trail rides with her. She is a very responsible and fun babysitter. I never met a kid that did not fall in love with her.

description.displayText: I would recommend Margot to anyone looking for a thoughtful, responsible babysitter. She has watched my older children that are 4 years and 6 years younger than Margot. I also had a baby in 2013 and she has watched her as well. Margot is reliable, loving, nurturing and anyone would be lucky to have her as their sitter. In the interest of full disclosure I will say that she is my niece; that said I am very particular about who watches my children.
